clip.quote: 2024 is going to be a terrible year for real estate until it's not.
clip.why_clipworthy: This statement challenges the optimistic view of the market and sets up a discussion on market dynamics.
clip.suggested_hook: Is 2024 really the year to watch out for in real estate?

clip.quote: Real estate in 2024 is not going to have an inventory problem. It's going to have a mortgage problem.
clip.why_clipworthy: This shifts the focus from inventory to mortgage rates, offering a new perspective.
clip.suggested_hook: Why the real problem in 2024 isn't inventory, but mortgages.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Why the real problem in 2024 isn't inventory, but mortgages.",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Chris Linsell, a real estate expert predicting a shift in 2024. Forget inventory; it's all about mortgage rates.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Chris reveals that while homes are available, rising mortgage rates will challenge buyers. This changes the game for everyone in real estate.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) Focus on creative financing and understanding mortgage trends. This knowledge is crucial for thriving in 2024's market.",
```
